noSvgWithoutTitle.description:
Description

Enforces the usage of thetitleelement for thesvgelement.
It is not possible to specify thealtattribute for thesvgas for theimg.
To make svg accessible, the following methods are available:
provide the title element as the first child to svg
provide role="img" and aria-label or aria-labelledby to svg
noSvgWithoutTitle.option: This rule has no specific options.
